name: InventoryUnit
description: IM Inventory Unit resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: vendorUnitFamilyType
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Mnemonic of inventory unit family type (e.g. Fan, PSU) assigned by vendor

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: dateOfManufacture
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Date of Manufacture of inventory unit

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: dateOfLastService
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Date of last service or repair of inventory unit

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: unitPosition
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Position of inventory unit (e.g. Rack, shelf, slot, etc.)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: manufacturerData
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Manufacturer specific data of inventory unit

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: relatedFunction
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: This attribute carries the DN of related (ManagedFunction)
